plot: Beached is the story of a man, Nyoike ('Nyo'), struggling with life after experiencing a great tragedy. In his darkest moment, Nyo almost destroys himself when he receives help of the most unexpected nature.
title: Beached
plot_es: Beached is the story of a man, Nyoike ('Nyo'), struggling with life after experiencing a great tragedy. In his darkest moment, Nyo almost destroys himself when he receives help of the most unexpected nature.
plot_en: Beached is the story of a man, Nyoike ('Nyo'), struggling with life after experiencing a great tragedy. In his darkest moment, Nyo almost destroys himself when he receives help of the most unexpected nature.
